description
	1 fire_damage_+%
	2
	    1|# "%1%%% increased Fire Damage"
	    #|-1 "%1%%% reduced Fire Damage" negate 1
	lang "Portuguese"
	2
	    1|# "Dano de Fogo aumentado em %1%%%"
	    #|-1 "Dano de Fogo reduzido em %1%%%" negate 1
	lang "Traditional Chinese"
	2
	    1|# "增加 %1%%% 火焰傷害"
	    #|-1 "減少 %1%%% 火焰傷害" negate 1
	lang "Simplified Chinese"
	2
	    1|# "增加 %1%%% 火焰伤害"
	    #|-1 "减少 %1%%% 火焰伤害" negate 1
	lang "Thai"
	2

	lang "Russian"
	2
	    1|# "%1%%% увеличение урона от огня"
	    #|-1 "%1%%% уменьшение урона от огня" negate 1
	lang "French"
	2
	    1|# "%1%%% des Dégâts de Feu accrus"
	    #|-1 "%1%%% des Dégâts de Feu réduits" negate 1
	lang "German"
	2

	    #|-1 "%1%%% verringerter Feuerschaden" negate 1
	lang "Spanish"
	2
	    1|# "Daño de Fuego aumentado un %1%%%"
	    #|-1 "Daño de Fuego reducido un %1%%%" negate 1

	1 base_self_critical_strike_multiplier_-%

		1|# "You take %1%%% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes"
